io.netty.channel

类 ChannelPromiseNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.util.concurrent.PromiseNotifier<Void,ChannelFuture>
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelPromiseNotifier
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ChannelFutureListener, GenericFutureListener<ChannelFuture>, EventListener

    public final class ChannelPromiseNotifier
extends PromiseNotifier<Void,ChannelFuture>
implements ChannelFutureListener
    ChannelFutureListener implementation which takes other ChannelPromise(s) and notifies them on completion.

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 io.netty.channel.ChannelFutureListener

      • ChannelPromiseNotifier

        public ChannelPromiseNotifier(boolean logNotifyFailure,
                              ChannelPromise... promises)
        Create a new instance
        参数:
        logNotifyFailure - true if logging should be done in case notification fails.
        promises - the ChannelPromises to notify once this ChannelFutureListener is notified.
